name: MXSegmentedPager
description: The standard MXSegmentedPager class is a simple paging control using [HMSegmentedControl](https://github.com/HeshamMegid/HMSegmentedControl). The ParallaxHeader category is an extension that allow you to had a [VGParallaxHeader](https://github.com/stoprocent/VGParallaxHeader) to your segmentated pager.
